name: geolocate1
title: Neighbourhood Scale GeoLocalization Of Street Imagery with Machine Learning
subtitle: Master's Project @ UC. A Grade.

items.text: This project focuses on using machine learning to geolocalize street-level imagery at a neighbourhood scale. It was developed as part of my Master's degree and received an A grade.
Key achievement: Successfully implemented a Keras-based model for accurate geolocalization.
The project utilized convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and transfer learning techniques to analyze street imagery and predict geographic locations.

name: site1
title: This Website! / Responsive REACT front end
subtitle: Look, it's just hosted on Github pages

items.text: This project is the very website you're viewing! It's a responsive front-end built using Vue and hosted on GitHub Pages.
Key feature: Fully responsive design with seamless integration of Firebase for backend functionality.

name: chrome1
title: NZ's (very very briefly) most downloaded Chrome Extension
subtitle: It did make the reddit FrontPage...

items.text: This Chrome Extension briefly became New Zealand's most downloaded extension after gaining traction on Reddit's front page.
Key achievement: Gained viral popularity and thousands of downloads in a single day.

name: chess1
title: Bad Chess AI Compilation
subtitle: Not bad bots, Architecturally moronic approaches to Chess.. for fun!

items.text: This project is a compilation of intentionally poorly designed chess AIs, created for fun and experimentation.
Key feature: Explored unconventional and humorous approaches to chess AI architecture.

name: sentiment1
title: Sentiment Analysis Series
subtitle: Data science project using machine learning

items.text: This project involved building a series of sentiment analysis models using Python and TensorFlow to analyze text data.
Key achievement: Achieved high accuracy in sentiment classification across diverse datasets.
